newsitem.title: USA: IPO PRICING - SEEC Inc prices at $7.25.
newsitem.headline: IPO PRICING - SEEC Inc prices at $7.25.

text.p: Lead Underwriter H.C. Wainwright & Co Inc
NOTE: The company increased the proposed number of shares for its planned initial public offering to 1.8 million from 1.0 million shares previously.
Lead underwriter H.C. Wainwright & Co Inc said the initial public offering is not yet effective.
